CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: darkness growth
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Allows a plant that normally requires it, to grow without any light.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: darklight growth
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Allows a plant that normally requires sunlight or darkness, to grow with darklight.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: sun growth
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Allows a plant that normally requires darkness, to grow with sunlight.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: heat resistant
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Allows a plant to survive in extreme heat, with slower growth speed.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: cold resistant
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Allows a plant to survive in extreme cold, with slower growth speed.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: blight resistant
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Prevents a plant from ever being blighted.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: fire resistant
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Prevents a plant from ever catching fire.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: long life
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: When a plant is ready to harvest, it typically dies fairly quickly, this extends that significantly so you have more time to harvest it.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: rapid growth
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Doubles the effectiveness of growth boosts applied to the plant.

CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.label: tox resistant
CultivaRim.CropTraitDef.description: Prevents a plant from dying in toxic conditions, but it will only grow at a fraction of normal speed.
